column4: could anyone please run grep -c '^Package' available and tell me what number they get?
thanks, mine seems to be b0rk :)
the number of lines in your available file that starts with "Package:"
i'm not sure :) i'm trying to figure out what's supposed to be there
Cause I was just thinking if you can alter that number by flushing your local repositories by apt-get clean.
But don't take my word on that, I have been documentedly wrong before. :)
ah, that was my guess! thanks
Np. Glad to be of help.
btw, isn't your 1894 a tad small then?
I suppose. I have Hoary main/universe/multiverse/security in my sources.list.
same here. but mine is about 10 times yours :)
